description.value:
The &Reference[dragon]{dragon} turtle makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

Melee Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage 3d12 + @mod type=piercing average=true]] damage.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].

Melee Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage 2d8 + @mod type=slashing average=true]] damage.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].

The &Reference[dragon]{dragon} turtle exhales scalding steam in a 60-foot &Reference[cone]{cone}. Each creature in that area must make a [[/save con 16 format=long]], taking [[/damage 15d6 type=fire average=true]] damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. Being underwater doesn't grant resistance against this damage.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]] and a save is required.

Amphibious. The &Reference[dragon]{dragon} turtle can breathe air and water.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

Reduced Threat. This creature has -2 penalty on all ability checks and saving throws.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

Chains. Magic infuses the chains, which are long enough to allow the &Reference[dragon]{dragon} turtle free run of the chamber. When the &Reference[dragon]{dragon} turtle moves, any creature within 10 feet of its path must succeed on a [[/save dex 12 format=long]] or be knocked &Reference[prone]{prone}.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]] and a save is required.
